mdRecord.dcterms:title: War Time Correspondence to Capt. Stigleman from SDL
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time correspondence, January 19, 1862, to Capt. Stigleman from SDL (illegible) at General Hospital, Warrenton. Subject: all sick sent to Warrenton, the possible draft and some laggards in Floyd. 1 original piece.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
